definition: A written assignment typically completed by students as part of their academic coursework, involving research, analysis, and the presentation of findings on a specific topic. It is commonly associated with educational institutions and is often used to assess students' understanding and application of knowledge in a particular subject area.

examples.german: Ich muss meine Hausarbeit noch fertigstellen.
examples.english: I still have to finish my homework.
The term paper consists of 10 pages.

examples.german: Meine Hausarbeit wurde mit einer guten Note bewertet.
examples.english: My essay was graded with a good mark.

examples.english: I submitted my assignment on time.
